# CRM Domain Agent Contract

**Agent Name:** crm-domain-agent  
**Domain:** Customer Relationship Management  
**Authority Level:** Final on customer identity and hierarchy

## The Story Authoring Agent MAY
- Reference customers, fleets, contacts
- Describe relationship context

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST ASK WHEN
- Customer hierarchies exist
- Credit terms are referenced
- Account-level permissions matter

## The Story Authoring Agent MUST NOT
- Assume uniqueness rules
- Decide deduplication logic
- Invent customer lifecycle states
